de.tud.cs.se.ws15.kaesekaestchen_fancy_100_ex12.entity.fancy

Interface FancyHandle

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChineseWallStrategy, EarthQuakeStrategy, EmptyStrategy, FloodingStrategy

    public interface FancyHandle
    This interface is a handle for fancy strategies.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int action(Map gameMap, Player markingPlayer)
      This is called when a player selects an edge which has not yet been selected and which has previously been selected to cause a fancy action.

    • Method Detail

      • action

        int action(Map gameMap,
           Player markingPlayer)
        This is called when a player selects an edge which has not yet been selected and which has previously been selected to cause a fancy action.
        Parameters:
        gameMap - the map the action is supposed to happen on
        markingPlayer - the player who caused the action. This is needed if the action causes one or more fields to close.
        Returns:
        the amount of fields the player closed by causing the fancy action.
